short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension add-on for the Phoenix desktop application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
---
"Introducing Phoenix, guardian of the world’s most precious resource—attention. In a world filled with distractions like social media, pornography, and video games, our app stands as a sentinel, protecting and nurturing your attention."



What is Phoenix?

Phoenix is a tool designed to block digital distractions, promote productivity, and redefine your relationship with technology. It enables you to create personalized lists of apps and websites to block, set timers, schedule breaks, and more.

Learn more at https://www.phoenixblocker.com
